testimonials.name: Aakeefah
testimonials.quotes: Zubair is a true asset to any team. His passion for his work and the ability to deliver exceptional results make him an invaluable partner in any software development endeavor.

testimonials.name: Thimna
testimonials.quotes: Zubair is one of most humble and respectful people that I know. One thing about him is that he knows how to manage he's time efficiently and he is able to communicate clearly whether if its within a crowd or one on one.

testimonials.name: Corne
testimonials.quotes: Zubair Moerat is an exceptional student and a valuable addition to any team. I have no doubt that he will excel in any future endeavors in the tech industry.

testimonials.name: Al-Muakhir
testimonials.quotes: Always available to help, incredibly proficient, hits deadlines without fail, hard working and trustworthy.  I can recommend him without hesitation.

testimonials.name: Niyaaz
testimonials.quotes: Zubair an invaluable asset to any web development team. I wholeheartedly recommend him for his professionalism, expertise, and unwavering dedication to excellence in web development.

testimonials.name: Tamlin Leigh
testimonials.quotes: His exceptional coding skills, collaborative mindset, and dedication to excellence make him an ideal candidate for positions that demand the very best.
